name: Verify Language Localization
description: Validates that language selection settings work correctly and translate UI text appropriately.
testObjective: Ensure language localization system functions properly and displays correct translations.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Open settings and navigate to language options
steps.expected: List of available languages is displayed

steps.action: Select a different language from the current one
Check UI text throughout the game
steps.expected: All UI text is translated to the selected language consistently

steps.action: Verify in-game messages, menus, and terminals
steps.expected: Translation is complete and consistent across all interfaces

postconditions: Language changes are applied throughout the game
All translations are accurate and consistent
